item.title: Reflection in Java
item.author: matija@devflection.com (Matija Heričko)
item.description:
Reflection is the ability of an application to inspect and modify the code in the system.

If an application can only inspect but not also modify the code then it only has the ability of introspection.

So for an application to be reflective it must also be able to modify its code at runtime.

item.description: General Code complete 2 Code complete is another book that is extremely valuable and is probably one of the classics in the field. This book is a must read for any developer that wants to improve on their craft.
